replies.body: If you listen close enough, you can hear the cries of every person that wants Championship Riven {{champion:92}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
If this reaches 1,000+ upvotes. Rito I think its time for Championship Riven to return sometime soon.
literally they said every championship skin was going back in the shop, EXCEPT RIVEN. they are fucking trolls lol
T..T RIVEN!!!!
Apparently, the only way to get Championship Riven is to be 100% correct at the World's prediction game.
so your saying there's a chance?
We just have to keep pushing it down their throats till they give it to us!!! xD
yes bring back champ riven
OR for once riot can leave legacy content to the players that were around at that time.

I think they said one day they will throw it into shop for a little.
But you can get it if you get perfect picks for Pickems
Oh, the only way to get it is to 100% predict worlds in the pick 'em. Luckily I already have the skin :)
Why? {{champion:245}} I've already seen who wins.
{{champion:26}} I knew you would do that.
Lucky
Hehe not lucky friend, just been playing a while!

Good job Rito. Dat Bloodmoon kalista pentakill in a Championship Kalista video
would u rather them show random clips of a lonely championship kalista killing redbuffs?
If a video says Championship Kalista Arrives, it should b about Championship Kalista{{champion:429}}
It depicting a few of the events leading up to Riot's choice of making a Championship skin for Kalista. So in essence, it is about Championship Kalista.
This guy gets it.
Exactly lol. look at the reveal videos for the other championship skins
It is to show what she has done to become worthy of wearing this armor

I dont know if its just me but earlier when i was checking out the mystery gifting, it said the Big Play bonus was available, but when i checked it later, around 11:00 P.M. MTN time, it didnt say the bonuses were available, is it a day to day basis, or a bug?

"Pick up this celebratory icon for 1 IP."

I'm so happy you guys released this for IP because, gotta be honest... I was expecting you guys to charge 250RP for it.
